tool_description: NetDetective is an easy-to-use API that provides information about an IP address, including, but not limited to, whether it's known for spam, brute-force attacks, bot-nets, VPN endpoints, data center endpoints, and more. With DetectiveIP, you can quickly and easily gather information about any IP address to help filter requests and avoid potential attacks.
title: NetDetective

api_list.name: /query
api_list.description: Query information about an IP address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://netdetective.p.rapidapi.com/query"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netdetective.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

success.description: Whether or not the call was successful.

isVpn.description: The IP address is a VPN.

isDataCenter.description: Indicates whether the IP address belongs to a data center.

isBruteForce.description: The IP address is known for brute-force attacks.

isSpam.description: The IP address is known for sending spam.

isBogon.description: The IP address is a bogon (i.e., it should not appear in the public Internet routing table).

isProxyHttp.description: The IP address is an open HTTP proxy.

isProxySocks.description: The IP address is an open SOCKS proxy.

isProxyWeb.description: The IP address is a web proxy.

isProxyOther.description: The IP address is a type of proxy.

isSmtpRelay.description: The IP address is used to relay SMTP traffic.

isWebVuln.description: The IP address is vulnerable webserver that can be used for abuse.

isNoMail.description: The IP address should not be used for email.

isZombie.description: The IP address is a zombie (i.e., part of a botnet).

isPotentialZombie.description: The IP address is a potential zombie.

isDynamic.description: The IP address is dynamically assigned.

isNoServer.description: The IP address is not associated with a server.

isBadConf.description: The IP address is a misconfigured server.

isDDos.description: The IP address is known for DDoS attacks.

isOpenDns.description: The IP address belongs to an OpenDNS resolver.

isCompromised.description: The IP address has been compromised.

isWorm.description: The IP address is part of a worm infection.

isIrcDrone.description: The IP address is an IRC drone

isNotSpam.description: The IP address is not associated with spamming.

parameters.name: ipaddress
parameters.description:
The IP address to use for the query.
Defaults to the ip address of the connecting client

utterances.utterance: Can you provide information about the IP address 192.168.1.1?
What details can you give me about the IP 10.0.0.1?
Is the IP address 172.16.254.1 associated with any malicious activity?
Tell me if 203.0.113.195 is known for spam or brute-force attacks.
Does the IP address 198.51.100.1 belong to a data center?
Can you check if 192.0.2.1 is a VPN endpoint?
Is 203.0.113.1 part of any bot-net?
Provide information about the IP address 198.18.0.1.
Can you tell me if 192.168.0.1 is known for any malicious activities?
What can you tell me about the IP address 10.10.10.1?

api_list.name: /query
api_list.description: Query information about an IP address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://netdetective.p.rapidapi.com/query"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netdetective.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
api_list.body:
{
	"success": true,
	"result": {
		"ipAddress": "",
		"isVpn": true,
		"isDataCenter": true,
		"isBruteForce": true,
		"isSpam": true,
		"isBogon": true,
		"isProxyHttp": true,
		"isProxySocks": true,
		"isProxyWeb": true,
		"isProxyOther": true,
		"isSmtpRelay": true,
		"isWebVuln": true,
		"isNoMail": true,
		"isZombie": true,
		"isPotentialZombie": true,
		"isDynamic": true,
		"isNoServer": true,
		"isBadConf": true,
		"isDDos": true,
		"isOpenDns": true,
		"isCompromised": true,
		"isWorm": true,
		"isIrcDrone": true,
		"isNotSpam": true
	}
}
